definition: all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
see 五彩繽紛|五彩缤纷[wu3 cai3 bin1 fen1]
all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display

sentences.english: Days are coloured bubbles that float upon the surface of fathomless night.
sentences.chinese: 白晝是色彩繽紛的浮沫，於深邃的夜色中浮蕩。

sentences.english: This nutrient superstar is found concentrated in the brightly colored skins and flesh of most foods in their natural form.

sentences.english: The garden is carpeted with a mass of multicoloured flowers .
sentences.chinese: 花園裏花草茂密，五彩繽紛。

sentences.english: B：It's very colorful because many leaves of trees change colours in autumn.
sentences.chinese: 秋天是色彩繽紛的，因爲各種樹葉在秋天改變了顏色。

sentences.english: BE what make the campus life that we enrich back a riotous color gradually?
sentences.chinese: 是什麼使我們豐富的校園生活漸退了繽紛的色彩呢？

sentences.english: Air gun salute profusion, blooming new smile.
sentences.chinese: 禮炮繽紛空中嘯，花團錦簇新人笑。

sentences.english: And many a Garden by the Water blows.
sentences.chinese: 多少傍水的園子裏花開繽紛。

sentences.english: Just because of that years of changes with each new, vitality abundant, a riot of color .

sentences.english: Canister of basin piling a basin is placed on the balcony, kind on profusion flowers and plants has eyeful green.

sentences.english: Hedgerows and meadows are thick with a tapestry of wild flowers.
sentences.chinese: 灌木樹籬和草地中開滿了五彩繽紛的野花。

sentences.english: Let my love , like sunlight, surround you and yet give you illumined freedom.
sentences.chinese: 讓我的愛像陽光一般圍繞你，並給你五彩繽紛的自由。

Review whole bedroom, profusion colour is wanton jump move, harmonious and not messy.

sentences.english: At the bottom you'll see Yellowstone River winding through the colorful canyon.
sentences.chinese: 在峽谷底我們可看到黃石河穿梭在五彩繽紛的峽谷中。

sentences.english: Because you teach, our worlds are filled with a riotous color.
sentences.chinese: 因爲您的教誨，我們的世界充滿繽紛色彩。
